name: Hamburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and your choice of cheese.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, tender grilled chicken, Parmesan cheese, and croutons, all tossed with a creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
description: A delicious mix of vegetables and rice stir-fried to perfection with soy sauce and other seasonings.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian dish featuring spaghetti noodles topped with a hearty meat sauce.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A delicious plant-based patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and your choice of cheese.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Freshly battered and fried fish served with crispy French fries.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and croutons, all tossed with a creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: A flavorful Indian dish featuring marinated chicken cooked in a clay oven.

name: Mushroom Burger
description: Juicy mushroom patty served on a soft bun with lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Tender strips of beef in a creamy mushroom sauce served over egg noodles.

name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
description: Grilled chicken breast topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of cheese on a toasted bun.

name: Vegetable Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, and other vegetables in a sweet and savory sauce.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and spicy pepperoni.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella cheese, tomato slices, and basil leaves drizzled with balsamic vinegar.

name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked pulled pork smothered in BBQ sauce and served on a toasted bun.

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken Breast
description: Tender chicken breast stuffed with spinach and feta cheese and baked to perfection.

name: Vegetable Curry
description: A flavorful Indian dish featuring a mix of vegetables in a rich curry sauce.

name: Beet and Goat Cheese Salad
description: Roasted beets, crumbled goat cheese, and candied pecans on a bed of mixed greens.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese in a crispy taco shell.
